description:
Start promoting your business or cause more effectively through your Facebook Page.

This course is for people who are entirely new to using a Facebook Page for their business, organization or cause, or who are struggling to understand it. It describes the absolute basics, such as how to navigate around a Facebook Page on a laptop or desktop computer.

The course comprises demonstrations and explanations of how to use a Facebook Page. It includes tips and recommendations on how to use features of your Page more effectively.
title: Facebook for business - the absolute basics
